title: Strengthening E-Learning Practical Competencies: Microlearning Course on Post-Cardiac Surgery Patient Monitoring

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Identify and explain at least three signs of postoperative complications after cardiac surgery.
Apply methods for tracking and recording patient vital signs using a mobile app.
Perform essential self-care procedures for each postoperative recovery phase with over 80% accuracy.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
